price: Hakika haya ni majaribio yaliyo dhaahiri.
footnotes: Hakika majaribio haya tuliyo mjaribia Ibrahim na mwanawe bila ya shaka ni majaribio yaliyo dhihirisha undani wa Imani yao na yakini yao kwa Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
